channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to Logging 2019-07-11 Added a new field statusType in LoggingLegacyData to retrieve the final status of the transacction. Added a new input field first in LoggingLegacyFilterInput to be able to change the size of the response. By default up to 100 results will be returned. 2019-07-10 Fix an error that was causing to download files with empty content.

item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
